name: Firefighting Space Monkes
description:
Two monkeys are destined to save the ape galaxy from burning! By piloting their rocket as they can and using their fire extinguishers to propel the spaceship, they have to pull out the fires and return to the landing pad.

Controls:

Menu: Mouse & Keyboard to navigate

Game: Press SPACE to propel the spaceship to the left/right, depending on the player side.

SFX & Music used all under CC Commons license.
